name: Determine Destiny
description:
Made for Epic MegaJam 2022

!! YOU MUST OPEN GAME FROM WITHIN FOLDER TO WORK!!

Help to unravel fate while figuring out people's destinies by solving this tarot puzzle game! 

Used Assets from -

1. Interface & Item Sounds Pack Daydream Sound - Sound Effects

2. Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra Taylor Brook Music - Music

3. Low Poly Medieval Interior and Constructions PolyArt3D - Environments
